title: Dominican Republic: Citi Presents Exclusive Forum for Citigold Clients
summary: Santo Domingo - In the Dominican Republic, Citi invited its Citigold clients, who receive the most exclusive personal and wealth management services, to a special presentation offering a global vision of the economy and investment prospects. The talk was held as part of a conference on "Investment Prospects and Global Economic Outlook," a cycle of talks the bank is presenting in a number of countries to provide its clients with current information about global economic trends and investment prospects.
tag-1: Dominican Republic: Citi Presents Exclusive Forum for Citigold Clients
tag-3: Santo Domingo – In the Dominican Republic, Citi invited its Citigold clients, who receive the most exclusive personal and wealth management services, to a special presentation offering a global vision of the economy and investment prospects. The talk was held as part of a conference on "Investment Prospects and Global Economic Outlook," a cycle of talks the bank is presenting in a number of countries to provide its clients with current information about global economic trends and investment prospects.
tag-4: More than 100 clients and other participants attended the conference at the Hilton Hotel on November 21. Speakers included Edward Montero, Citi's Vice Chairman of Wealth Management and Private Banking for Latin America, and Renato Grandmont, head of Wealth Management and Private Banking Investments for Latin America, who explained the importance of Citigold service in the Dominican Republic and shared their ample knowledge of the market.
tag-5: For his part, Máximo Vidal, General Manager of Citi Dominican Republic, described Citigold as an exclusive service giving clients access to personalized financial advice from experienced professionals. "We have offered our clients quality service for 200 years, providing individuals, families and companies with access to world-class products and services around the world. We are committed to helping clients manage their wealth today and in the future," Vidal explained.
tag-6: At the conference, the Citi executives emphasized the different services Citigold offers individuals, families and companies in the Dominican Republic who are looking for an international banking relationship. Following the talk, the participants were invited to a cocktail reception at the hotel.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
